mapper.sql: id, user_id AS userId, target_id AS targetId, `type`, create_date AS createDate, update_date AS updateDate, create_by AS createBy, update_by AS updateBy, del_flag AS delFlag
mapper.select: SELECT fh.* FROM dd_follow_history fh where fh.target_id=#{0} and fh.type=2 ORDER BY fh.update_date DESC
